ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities include the addition of failing assertions and a pull request to pause playback when entering gameplay test from the editor, addressing the issue https://github.com/ppy/osu/issues/312. These updates aim to improve the gameplay experience and test interactions within the osu repository.

ppy/s3-nginx-proxy.summary: The repository saw a push event preserving upstream Cache-Control headers through a merge pull request, which ensures that the Cache-Control headers from the upstream server are maintained in the proxy responses, enhancing the caching behavior of the s3-nginx-proxy repository.
